name: FishyFish (Shynif)
description:
Game made in 36 hours.

------------ Controls ---------------

Space bar - Catch fish
Left arrow - Go to shop
Right arrow - Go back to fishing

----------- Notes ------------

This game was made because he had fun with "bot pancake" on discord with the fishing mini game.
There is only one item to buy in the shop right now, I might update it soon.
I hope you will have fun and catch many fishes !
